passive.name: Deep, Deep Breaths
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>. This effect can stack up to {{4}} times and lasts for {{5}} turn(s).
